lead_paragraph: ISTANBUL, Turkey, April 29 (Delayed) (AP) -- While scolding Britain for her failure to supply adequate assistance to Greece, the Turkish press stoutly affirmed Turkey's friendship with the Allies today and said that any German threat to Turkey's independence would mean war.
abstract: Turkish press asserts bond with Allies unbroken

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
